<!-- Kontrollleiste -->
<div class="vpNaviContainer" ng-hide="snapshot.active">
	<!-- Buttons - auf Objekt fokusieren -->
	<div class="ctrlGroup">
		<button title="Focus All" class="ctrlBtn" ng-class="(activeBtn == 'zoom_all') ? 'active' : ''" ng-click="focusAll()" ng-mousedown="activeBtn = 'zoom_all'" ng-mouseup="activeBtn = ''" ng-mouseleave="activeBtn = ''"><img src="img/icons/zoom_all_w.png"/></button>
		<button title="Focus Selection" class="ctrlBtn" ng-class="(activeBtn == 'zoom_sel') ? 'active' : ''"  ng-click="focusSelected()" ng-mousedown="activeBtn = 'zoom_sel'" ng-mouseup="activeBtn = ''" ng-mouseleave="activeBtn = ''"><img src="img/icons/zoom_sel_w.png"/></button>
	</div>
	<!-- Buttons - navigieren -->

		<button title="Ansicht drehen" class="ctrlBtn" ng-class="{ active: navigation.rotate }" ng-click="setNavigationMode('rotate')"><img src="img/icons/orbit_w.svg" width="24"/></button>
		<button title="Ansicht verschieben" class="ctrlBtn" ng-class="{ active: navigation.pan }" ng-click="setNavigationMode('pan')"><img src="img/icons/move_w.svg" width="24"/></button>
		<button title="Ansicht zoomen" class="ctrlBtn" ng-class="{ active: navigation.zoom }" ng-click="setNavigationMode('zoom')"><img src="img/icons/zoom2_w.svg" width="24"/></button>
	</div>

		<select class="form-control input-sm" ng-options="s for s in viewportSettings.shading" ng-model="viewportSettings.shadingSel" ng-change="setShading(viewportSettings.shadingSel)"></select>
		<select class="form-control input-sm" ng-options="c for c in viewportSettings.camera" ng-model="viewportSettings.cameraSel" ng-change="setCamera(viewportSettings.cameraSel)"></select>
	</div>
